body.name: LEPOWER LED Desk Lamp, 800LM for Home Office, 12W Reading , Eye-Caring Desk Light, Touch Table Lamp, Gooseneck Lamp, 50 Lighting Modes, Bright Desk Lamps for Bedroom, Study Room

features: RG0 Certified Eye-Caring Desk Lamps: LEPOWER LED desk light is designed with RG0 lamp beads and professional optical lenses, which 100% prevent hazardous blue light. Our desk lighting has reached the RG0 level in IEC 62778, effectively protecting your eyes from fatigue and preventing vision loss.

Upgraded Lamp Panel: LEPOWER office desk lamp's panel is 200% wider than typical desk lamps', and its lighting area is up to 50’’. This 12W LED table light casts 800LM soft bright light that exceeds the brightness of its peers by 100% while giving off 1400 lux.

50 Lighting Choices: 5 color temperatures x 10 brightness levels, easily adjust the desk lights to suit your mood or surroundings. Dimmable Led lamp desk is perfect for working, studying, reading, drawing, sewing, nail, puzzle, craft, etc.
Flexible Gooseneck Design: LEPOWER gooseneck desk lamps features a durable metal gooseneck. This 360° adjustable gooseneck can help to project the light to any position needed.

Touch Control & Smart Memory: Easily adjust the Light settings not only with the traditional +/- buttons but also with the stepless slide-control bar. With Smart Memory Function, the office desk lamp will remain its last settings when turned back on so you don’t have to adjust it all over again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LEPOWER Led Desk Lamp is a part of LEPOWER's continuous pursuit of creating highly efficient and convenient products for our customers. This table lamp is designed with high-quality metal and ABS to have a smooth texture that creates a modern vibe. It is a good fit for office, study, and dorm.
Previous page Next page 1 50’’ Lighting Area 2 5 Color Temperatures 3 10 Brightness Levels 4 Touch Control 5 True Color Vision

Extra Bright Light Compared with others, our desk lamp can always provide you with some extra light. This 12W LED desk light casts 800LM soft bright light that exceeds the brightness of its peers by 100%.

Made to be Eye-protecting Long-term exposure to short-wavelength blue light is harmful to human eyes and may cause permanent damage. LEPOWER's LED desk lamp uses eye-caring LED beads and professionally designed lenses to 100% filter the hazardous blue light to offer a true-colored vision while protecting your eyes. Efficiently Filters Harmful Blue Light LEPOWER's advanced technology and design results in 0 hazardous blue light, ensuring a quality color rendering without causing any health damage. RG0 Certified LEPOWER‘s LED desk lamp is officially tested by the standard of IEC 62778. The RG0 certification means its light is 100% eye-friendly and will not bring any health issues or extra pressure to your eyes.

200% Wider Panel No more unlit corners on the table to worry about Substantial & Strong The larger size and the refined design help to create a sleek look. Made with Metal & ABS High-quality materials makes the lamp sturdy and stable. Flexible Gooseneck Metal-built gooseneck offers great flexibility as well as lasts longer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have time to write a detailed review, but I’m surprised that I haven’t reviewed this light yet. This product is fantastic. After I got the first lamp, I noticed my husband unplugging it and moving it around our home as he needed it. So I got a second one. But two lamps weren’t enough; he was moving that around too! So I got two more! I’m laughing as I write that, but these lamps are just wonderful and well worth the money. They are fairly easy to set up, easy to use, and have great features. My four lamps are set up in four different locations, giving out great light, and working well for my household!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright light
reviews.reviewText: Lamp is packed in a small box. It has to be put together. Comes with instructions. All the pieces are easy to assemble. No buttons or switches. All touch on and off. Slide your finger to adjust brightness. Adjustable neck so you can direct light where you want it. Has a weighted base. Good looking desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and worked well from the start.
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the Lamp. It assembled easily and worked right away with no problems. It has been working well for me for a few weeks. I am using this lamp to light up the work area next to my laptop computer, to see my (1) auxiliary keyboard, (2) my mouse and (3) the papers that I take notes from. The position of the lamp pole and head adjusts well and holds where they are set. It provides plenty of light, and I use the intensity from 50% to 100% of full lighting. I typically don't adjust the position or change the light color setting and just turn it on and off when used about 10 hours a day. The color is comfortable on my eyes in all 3 settings. So far it's a win for me and I don't see any reason now why that would change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more eye strain headaches
reviews.reviewText: I wish I'd bought this lamp years ago. I love the versatile lighting options, color and dimming features, the adjustable neck, and stability of this item. It's exactly what I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The light looks great. Sleek, good weight, love the touch pad. It's a little weird putting it together though. The cord didn't fit into the extention right. It was too long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Lots of variations for lighting - brightness, coolness, and warmth. Excellent desk lamp - versatile. The base is a bit large, but luckily I have a big desk. Lights a significant portion of my desk. Only had it a month so can't vouch for the longevity, but if something unforeseen happens, I'll update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gooseneck, base, larger head desk lamp - nice controls
reviews.reviewText: The rigid piece rising up from the rectangular base is a little under 1 foot high. The gooseneck portion that goes into it is about 9 more inches, ending with a larger than normal 8 inch high by 3 inch wide light panel. The base is reasonably sturdy. The best thing about the product is the controls on the base - the 5 color modes dont do much for me - for one thing some seem a bit brighter than others rather than just different, and there seems to be more choices on the cool side of the color spectrum than the warm side. I actually liked my prior 3 mode lamp better in this regard. What is very nice on this lamp is the 10 brightness settings implemented via a slider - not so easy to hit all 10, but much easier to operate, especially when you dont have the easiest access or visibility. Power button also quite easy, and it remembers the settings. Havent decided on how much I like the larger light yet, but was pleased to find a gooseneck with a base (many offer only clamps) and good brightness. This one doesnt offer charging ports for phones as some do, which wasnt important to me. Also should mention that the large light itself can be positioned in any fashion - turned up, down, away, angled, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This is a stable, flexible lamp with control of brightness and light temperature. A great value.
